scripts.test:ci: cd server; npm run server:ci; npm run test:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server; npm run test:client
scripts.test:server: cd server; ENV_TXT=$(cat env.txt) npm test
scripts.start:dev: ENV_TXT=$(cat env.txt) concurrently "cd server; npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
